reviewText: Each and every movie Sidney starred in had substance and meaning.  Great performers.  Three of the movies I had never seen.  Wonderful cast members too.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic: Legends - Sidney Poitier
TCM Greatest Classic: Legends - Sidney Poitier

reviewText: I only liked a few of the movies--like Blackboard Jungle, but it was cheaper to order a 4 disk set than to get each movie separately.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic: Legends - Sidney Poitier

reviewText: wanting to see sidney poitier in action if you've got the fever for him this is it if he is your favorite actor this D V D, has the actionand suspence you'd like.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic: Legends - Sidney Poitier

reviewText: A Patch of Blue is one of my all time favorite movies so I got this set for that movie alone but greatly enjoyed the others as well.Sidney Poitier's versatility is superb.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic: Legends - Sidney Poitier

reviewText: This is a fantastic collection of films. Transfers are excellent and each movie is on its own disc. I got it for Blaackboard Jungle. The others were equally good. A true treasure indeed. I highly recommend this fine set.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic: Legends - Sidney Poitier

reviewText: This is a nice set of some of Sidney Poitier film from WB and few MGM's which are owned by WB. Each movie has it's own disk and is in a spindle type holder in a 14mm DVD case. The audio for all DVDs are English mono and French mono and the subtitles vary from English, French and Spanish. The films included are as follows:"The Blackboard Jungle" (1955/b&w;/Widescreen/100mins)Glenn Ford, Anne Francis, Louis Calhern, Margaret Hayes, Sidney Poitier; directed by Richard Brooks"Edge of City" (1957/b&w;/Widescreen/85mins)John Cassavetes, Sidney Poitier, Jack Warden, Kathleen Maguire; directed by Martin Ritt"Something of Value" (1957/color/Widescreen/114mins)Rock Hudson, Dana Wynter, Sidney Poitier, Wendy Hiller; directed by Richard Brooks"A Patch of Blue" (1965/b&w;/Widescreen/105mins)Sidney Poitier, Shelley Winters, Elizabeth Hartman; directed by Guy GreenOverall this is a great collection and is a product I would recommend.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic: Legends - Sidney Poitier

reviewText: I usually like Sidney Poitier movies.  These were perhaps some of his little known ones.  Patch of Blue and Blackboard Jungle were the best in this collection.  I really was not impressed with the other two.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic: Legends - Sidney Poitier

reviewText: I have only seen A Patch of Blue of this classic legend collection.  I will enjoy viewing them all and great to have in my library.  One thing I love about all of the Sidney Poitier movies that I have seen is that none of the stories are racially based.  They are a great subject matter and good quality material and acting.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic: Legends - Sidney Poitier
